examples.example: 我每天进步一点儿，就会离梦想更近一点儿。

translate.english: I make a little progress every day, and I will be a little closer to the dream.

examples.example: 只要我们每个人都付出一点儿爱，世界将会变得更加美好一点儿。

translate.english: As long as each of us gives a little love, the world will become a little better.

examples.example: 我相信只要努力一点儿，成功就会离我们更近一点儿。

translate.english: I believe that as long as we work a little harder, success will be a little closer to us.
